GK19amaru_u:0: Text Abbreviations This edition is based on the one in Kāvya-saṅgraha edited by Jīvānanda
GK19amaru_u:1: Vidyāsāgara. It has been compared with the Motilal Banarsidass edition
GK19amaru_u:2: containing the commentary of Arjunavarmadeva. The number in parentheses at the end of the last line of each verse is the number of the verse in the Motilal
GK19amaru_u:3: edition. There seems to be a great deal of variation in the order and numbering of the verses between the editions and the commentators. The order of the verses found in the Kāvya-saṅgraha forms the backbone of the order of the verses
GK19amaru_u:4: presented here, even though Arjunavarmadeva considers some of the verses found in that edition to be interpolations. Those suspect verses have been noted
GK19amaru_u:6: The parentheses in between verses contain citations for the major
GK19amaru_u:7: anthologies. These have been taken from Sures Chandra Banerji's
GK19amaru_u:8: edition of Śrīdharadāsa's Sadukti-karṇāmṛta. The abbreviations for those anthologies are the
GK19amaru_u:15: (These equivalences have been taken from the Banerji edition of
GK19amaru_u:16: Sad-ukti-karṇāmṛta and the De edition of Padyāvalī.)
GK19amaru_u:25: āliṅgan yo'vadhūtastripurayuvatibhiḥ sāśrunetrotpalābhiḥ kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ ||2|| (2)
GK19amaru_u:27: ālolāmalakāvalīṃ vilulitāṃ bibhraccalatkuṇḍalaṃ kiñcinmṛṣṭaviśeṣakaṃ tanutaraiḥ khedāmbhasāṃ śīkaraiḥ |
GK19amaru_u:28: tanvyā yatsuratāntatāntanayanaṃ vaktraṃ rativyatyaye tattvāṃ pātu cirāya kiṃ hariharabrahmādibhirdaivataiḥ (viparītaratam- sad. 1141, śā. 3702)
GK19amaru_u:30: hṛdayanihitaṃ bhāvākūtaṃ vamadbhirivekṣaṇaiḥ kathaya sukṛtī ko'yaṃ mugdhe tvayādya vilokyate (vāsakasajjā; su. 508; sad. 658)
GK19amaru_u:31: datto'syāḥ praṇayastvayaiva bhavatā ceyaṃ ciraṃ lālitā daivād adya kila tvameva kṛtavān asyā navaṃ vipriyam |
GK19amaru_u:32: manyurduḥsaha eṣa yātyupaśamaṃ no sāntvavādaiḥ sphuṭaṃ he nistraṃśa vimuktakaṇṭhakaruṇaṃ tāvatsakhī roditu ||5||(6)
GK19amaru_u:33: likhannāste bhūmiṃ bahiravanataḥ prāṇadayito nirāhārāḥ skahyaḥ satataruditocchūṇanayanāḥ |
GK19amaru_u:34: parityaktaṃ sarvaṃ hasitapaṭhitaṃ pañjaraśukais tavāvasthā ceyaṃ visṛja kaṭhine mānamadhunā (sakhīprabodhaḥ; sad. 713, rasārṇavasudhākara 2.206a)
GK19amaru_u:35: nāryastanvi haṭhāddharanti ramaṇaṃ tiṣṭhanti no vāritās tatkiṃ tāmyasi kiṃ ca rodiṣi mudhā tāsāṃ priyaṃ mā kṛthāḥ |
GK19amaru_u:36: kāntaḥ keliruciryuvā sahṛdayastādṛkpatiḥ kātarae kiṃ no barkarakarkaraiḥ priyaśatairākramya vikrīyate ||7||(8)
GK19amaru_u:38: nāryo mugdhaśaṭhā haranti ramaṇaṃ tiṣṭhanti no vāritās
GK19amaru_u:39: kopātkomalalolabāhulatikāpāśena baddhā dṛḍhaṃ nītvā keliniketanaṃ dayitayā sāyaṃ sakhīnāṃ puraḥ |
GK19amaru_u:40: bhūyo'pyevamiti skhalan mṛdugirā saṃsūcya duśceṣṭitaṃ dhanyo hanyata eva nihnutiparaḥ preyān rudatyā hasan ||8|| (9)
GK19amaru_u:44: iti dinaśataprāpyaṃ deśaṃ priyasya yiyāsato harati gamanaṃ bālālāpaiḥ sabāṣpagalajjalaiḥ ||9||
GK19amaru_u:46: yātāḥ kiṃ na milanti sundari punaścintā tvayā matkṛte no kāryā nitarāṃ kṛśāmi kathayatyevaṃ sabāṣpe mayi |
GK19amaru_u:47: lajjāmantharatārakeṇa nipataddhārāśruṇā cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā māṃ hāsitena bhāvimaraṇotsāhastayā sūcitaḥ ||10||(10)
GK19amaru_u:48: dhīraṃ vāridharasya vāri kirataḥ śrutvā niśīthe dhvaniṃ dīrghocchvāsamudaśruṇā virahiṇīṃ bālāṃ ciraṃ dhyāyatā |
GK19amaru_u:49: adhvanyena vimuktakaṇṭhamakhilāṃ rātriṃ tathā kranditaṃ grāmīṇairvrajato janasya vasatirgrāme niṣiddhā yathā ||11||(13)
GK19amaru_u:51: kathamapi sakhi krīḍākopād vrajeti mayodite kaṭhinahṛdayastyaktvā śayyāṃ balād gata eva saḥ
GK19amaru_u:52: iti sarabhasaṃ dhvastapremṇi vyapetaghṛṇe jane punarapi hatavrīḍaṃ cetaḥ prayāti karomi kim
GK19amaru_u:53: dampatyorniśi jalpatorgṛhaśukenākarṇitaṃ yadvacas tatprātargurusannidhau nigadatastasyopahāraṃ vadhūḥ |
GK19amaru_u:54: karṇālaṅkṛtipadmarāgaśakalaṃ vinyasya cañcūpuṭe vrīḍārtā prakaroti dāḍimaphalavyājena vāgbandhanam (śukoktivrīḍā, kuval. 173, su. 621, sad. 1180, subh. 2214, śā. 3743)
GK19amaru_u:55: ajñānena parāṅmukhīṃ paribhavād āśliṣya māṃ duḥkhitāṃ kiṃ labdhaṃ caṭula tvayeha nayatā saubhāgyametāṃ daśām |
GK19amaru_u:58: ekatrāsanasaṃsthitiḥ parihatā pratudgamād dūratas tāmbūlānayanacchalena rabhasāśelṣo'pi saṃvighnitaḥ
GK19amaru_u:59: ālāpo'pi na miśritaḥ parijanaṃ vyāpārayantyāntike kāntaṃ pratyupacārataścaturayā kopaḥ kṛtārthīkṛtaḥ (māninī, sad. 692, rasārṇavasudhākara 2.67g)
GK19amaru_u:60: dṛṣṭvaikāsanasaṃsthite priyatame paścād upetyādarād ekasyā nayane pidyāya vihitakrīḍānubandhacchalaḥ
GK19amaru_u:61: īṣadvakrimakandharaḥ sapulakaḥ premollasanmānasām antarhāsalasatkapolaphalakāṃ dhūrto'parāṃ cumbati ||16||(19)
GK19amaru_u:64: vrajati ramaṇe niḥśvasyoccaiḥ stanasthitahastayā nayanasalilacchannā dṛṣṭiḥ sakhīṣu niveśitā
GK19amaru_u:66: kāñcyā gāḍhatarāvaruddhavasanaprāntā kimarthaṃ punar mugdhākṣī svaiptīti tatparijanaṃ svairaṃ priye pṛcchati |
GK19amaru_u:67: mātaḥ svaptumapīha vārayati māmityāhitakrodhayā paryasya svapiticchalena śayane datto'vakāśastayā
GK19amaru_u:69: ekasmiñśayane parāṅmukhatayā vītottaraṃ tāmyator anyonyasya hṛdi sthite'pyanunaye saṃrakṣatorgauravam
GK19amaru_u:70: dampatyoḥ śanakairapāṅgavalanān miśrībhavaccakṣuṣor bhagno mānakaliḥ sahāsarabhasaṃ vyāsaktakaṇṭhagraham
GK19amaru_u:72: paśyāmo mayi kiṃ prapadyata iti sthairyaṃ mayālambitaṃ kiṃ māmālapatītyayaṃ khala śaṭhaḥ kopastayāpyāśritaḥ
GK19amaru_u:73: ityanyonyavilakṣadṛṣṭicature tasminnavasthāntare savyājaṃ hasitaṃ mayā dhṛtiharo bāṣpastu muktastayā ||20||(24)
GK19amaru_u:75: parimlāne māne mukhaśaśini tasyāḥ karadhṛte mayi kṣīṇopāye praṇipatanamātraikaśaraṇe |
GK19amaru_u:76: tayā pakṣmaprāntavrajapuṭaniruddhena sahasā prasādo bāṣpena stanataṭaviśīrṇena kathitaḥ ||21||(25)
GK19amaru_u:79: ityukte kva tad ityudīrya sahasā tatsampramārṣṭuṃ mayā sāśliṣṭā rabhasena tatsukhavaśāttanvyāpi tad vismṛtam ||22||(26)
GK19amaru_u:80: tvaṃ mugdhākṣi vinaiva kañculikayā dhatse manohāriṇīṃ lakṣmīmityabhidhāyini priyatame tadvīṭikāṃ saṃspṛśi |
GK19amaru_u:82: bhrūbhaṅge racite'pi dṛṣṭiradhikaṃ sotkaṇṭhamudvīkṣate kārkaśyaṃ gamite'pi cetasi tanūromāñcamālambate
GK19amaru_u:83: ruddhāyāmapi vāci sasmitamidaṃ dagdhānanaṃ jāyate dṛṣṭe nirvahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati kathaṃ mānasya tasmiñjane ||24||(28)
GK19amaru_u:85: kānte katyapi vāsarāṇi gamaya tvaṃ mīlayitvā dṛśau svasti svasti nimīlayāmi nayane yāvan na śūnyā diśaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:86: āyātā vayamāgamiṣyati suhṛdvargasya bhāgyodayaiḥ sandeśo vada kastavābhilaṣitastīrtheṣu toyāñjaliḥ
GK19amaru_u:88: sā patyuḥ prathamāparādhasamaye sakhyopadeśaṃ vinā no jānāti savibhramāṅgavalanāvakroktisaṃsūcanam
GK19amaru_u:89: svacchairacchakapolamūlagalitaiḥ paryastanetrotpalā bālā kevalameva roditi luṭhallolālakairaśrubhiḥ
GK19amaru_u:91: bhavatu viditaṃ chadmālāpairalaṃ priya gamyatāṃ tanurapi na te doṣo'smākaṃ vidhistu parāṅmukhaḥ
GK19amaru_u:92: tava yathā tathābhūtaṃ prema prapannamimāṃ daśāṃ prakṛticapale kā naḥ pīḍā gate hatajīvite (māninīvākyam; sad. 708; pad. 223)
GK19amaru_u:93: urasi nihitastāro hāraḥ kṛtā jaghane ghane kalakalavatī kāñcī pādau kvaṇanmaṇinūpurau |
GK19amaru_u:94: priyamabhisarasyevaṃ mugdhe samāhataḍiṇḍimā yadi kimadhikatrāsotkampaṃ diśaḥ samudīkṣase ||28||(31)
GK19amaru_u:95: prātaḥ prātarupāgatena janitā nirnidritā cakṣuṣor mandāyāṃ mayi gauravavyapagamād utpāditaṃ lāghavam |
GK19amaru_u:96: kiṃ mugdhe na mayā kṛtaṃ ramaṇadhīrmuktā tvayā gamyatāṃ dusthaṃ tiṣṭhasi yacca pathyamadhunā kartāsmi tacchroṣyasi ||29||(33)
GK19amaru_u:97: sā bālā vayamapragalbhamanasaḥ sā strī vayaṃ kātarāḥ sā pīnonnatimatpayodharayugaṃ dhatte sakhedā vayam |
GK19amaru_u:98: sākrāntā jaghanasthalena guruṇā gantuṃ na śaktā vayaṃ doṣairanyajanāśritairapaṭavo jātāḥ sma ityadbhutam ||30||(34)
GK19amaru_u:100: prasthānaṃ valayaiḥ kṛtaṃ priyasakhairajasraṃ gataṃ dhṛtyā na kṣaṇamāsitaṃ vyavasitaṃ cittena gantuṃ puraḥ |
GK19amaru_u:101: gantuṃ niścitacetasi priyatame sarve samaṃ prasthitā gantavye sati jīvitapriyasuhṛtsārthaḥ kimu tyajyate ||31|| (35)
GK19amaru_u:103: sandaṣṭādharapallavā sacakitaṃ hastāgramādhunvatī māmāmuñca śaṭheti kopavacanairānartitabhrūlatā
GK19amaru_u:104: śītkārāñcitalocanā sarabhasaṃ yaiścumbitā māninī prāptaṃ tairamṛtaṃ mudhaiva mathito mūḍhaiḥ suraiḥ sāgaraḥ ||32||(36)
GK19amaru_u:107: premāvāsitayā mayā saralayā nyastaṃ mukhaṃ tanmukhe |
GK19amaru_u:108: jñāte'līkanimīlane nayanayordhūrtasya romāñcito lajjāsīn mama tena sāpyapahṛtā tatkālayogyaiḥ kramaiḥ ||33||(37)
GK19amaru_u:109: kopo yatra bhrūkuṭiracanā nigraho yatra maunaṃ yatrānyonyasmitamanunayo yatra dṛṣṭiḥ prasādaḥ
GK19amaru_u:110: tasya premṇastad idamadhunā vaiṣamaṃ paśya jātaṃ tvaṃ pādānte luṭhasi nahi me manyumokṣaḥ khalāyāḥ ||34||(38)
GK19amaru_u:112: sutanu jahihi kopaṃ paśya pādānataṃ māṃ na khalu tava kadācitkopa evaṃ vidho'bhūt |
GK19amaru_u:113: iti nigadati nāthe tiryagāmīlitākṣyā nayanajalamanalpaṃ muktamuktaṃ na kiñcit ||35||(39)
GK19amaru_u:116: mā mā mānada māti māmalamiti kṣāmākṣarollāpinī suptā kiṃ nu mṛtā nu kiṃ manasi me līnā vilīnā nu kim ||36||(40)
GK19amaru_u:117: paṭālagne patyau namayati mukhaṃ jātavinayā haṭhāśleṣaṃ vāñchatyapaharati gātrāṇi nibhṛtam
GK19amaru_u:118: na śaknotyākhyātuṃ smitamukhasakhīdattanayanā hriyā tāmyatyantaḥ prathamaparihāse navavadhūḥ
GK19amaru_u:120: gate premābandhe praṇayabahumāne vigalite nivṛtte sadbhāve jana iva jane gacchati puraḥ |
GK19amaru_u:121: tad utprekṣyotprekṣya priyasakhi gatāṃstāṃśca divasān na jāne ko heturdalati śatadhā yan na hṛdayam ||38||(43)
GK19amaru_u:125: kathamapi dine dīrghe yāte niśāmadhirūḍhayoḥ prasarati kathā bahvī yūnoryathā na tathā ratiḥ
GK19amaru_u:126: dīrghā vandanamālikā viracitā hṛṣṭyaiva nendīvaraiḥ puṣpāṇāṃ prakaraḥ smitena racito no kundajātyādibhiḥ
GK19amaru_u:127: dattaḥ svedamucā payodharayuge nārghyo na kumbhāmbhasā svairevāvayavaiḥ priyasya viśatastanvyā kṛtaṃ maṅgalam ||40||(45)
GK19amaru_u:128: kānte sāgasi śāyite priyasakhīveśaṃ vidhāyāgate bhrāntyāliṅgya mayā rahasyamuditaṃ tatsaṅgamākāṅkṣayā
GK19amaru_u:129: mugdhe duṣkarametad ityatitarāmuktvā sahāsaṃ balād āliṅgya chalitāsmi tena kitavenādya pradoṣāgame
GK19amaru_u:130: āśaṅkya praṇatiṃ paṭāntapihitau pādau karotyādarāt vyājenāgatamāvṛṇoti hasitaṃ na spaṣṭamudvīkṣate
GK19amaru_u:131: mayyālāpavati pratīpavacanaṃ sakhyā sahābhāṣate tasyāstiṣṭhatu nirbharapraṇayitā māno'pi ramyodayaḥ
GK19amaru_u:132: sā yāvanti padānyalīkavacanairālījanaiḥ śikṣitā tāvantyeva kṛtāgaso drutataraṃ vyāhṛtya patyuḥ puraḥ |
GK19amaru_u:133: prārabdhā purato yathā manasijasyājñā tathā vartituṃ premṇo maugdhyavibhūṣaṇasya sahajaḥ ko'pyeṣa kāntaḥ kramaḥ ||43||(48)
GK19amaru_u:134: dūrādutsukamāgate vivalitaṃ sambhāṣiṇi sphāritaṃ saṃśliṣyatyaruṇaṃ gṛhītavasane kiñcin natabhrūlatam
GK19amaru_u:135: māninyāścaraṇānativyatikare bāṣpāmbupūrṇekṣaṇaṃ cakṣurjātamaho prapañcacaturaṃ jātāgasi preyasi
GK19amaru_u:136: aṅgānāmatitānavaṃ kathamidaṃ kampaśca kasmātkuto mugdhe pāṇḍukapolamānanamiti prāṇeśvare pṛcchati
GK19amaru_u:137: tanvyā sarvamidaṃ svabhāvajamiti vyāhṛtya pakṣmāntara vyāpī bāṣpabharastayā calitayā niḥśvasya mukto'nyataḥ ||45||(50)
GK19amaru_u:138: purastanvyā gotraskhalanacakito'haṃ natamukhaḥ pravṛtto vailakṣyātkimapi likhituṃ daivahatakaḥ
GK19amaru_u:139: sphuṭo rekhānyāsaḥ kathamapi sa tādṛk pariṇato gatā yena vyaktaṃ punaravayavaiḥ saiva taruṇī ||46||(51)*asya ślokasya
GK19amaru_u:142: aho citraṃ citraṃ sphuṭamiti nigadyāśrukaluṣaṃ ruṣā brahmāstraṃ me śarasi nihito vāmacaraṇaḥ
GK19amaru_u:144: kaṭhinahṛdaye muñca bhrāntiṃ vyalīkakathāśritāṃ piśunavacanairdukhaṃ netuṃ na yuktamimaṃ janam
GK19amaru_u:145: kimidamathavā satyaṃ mugdhe tvayā hi viniścitaṃ yad abhirucitaṃ tan me kṛtvā priye sukhamāsyatām
GK19amaru_u:147: karmavyagrakuṭumbinīkucataṭasvedacchidaḥ prāvṛṣaḥ prārambhe nipatanti kandaladalollāsāḥ payobindavaḥ
GK19amaru_u:149: pītastuṣārakiraṇo madhunaiva sārdham antaḥ praviśya caṣake pratibimbavartī |
GK19amaru_u:150: mānāndhakāramapi mānavatījanasya nūnaṃ bibheda yad asau prasasāda sadyaḥ ||49||*rudramadevakumārasya
GK19amaru_u:153: nabhasi jaladalakṣmīṃ sambhṛtāṃ vīkṣya diṣṭyā prasarasi yadi kāntetyardhamuktvā kathañcit
GK19amaru_u:154: mama paṭamavalambya prollikhantī dharitrīṃ tadanukṛtavatī sā yatra vāco nivṛttāḥ ||50||*vemabhūpālasya ṭīkāyāmapyeṣa śloko dṛśyate|
GK19amaru_u:156: pṛthunitambabharālasagāminī priyatamā mama jīvitahāriṇī ||51||*prakṣipto'yaṃ śloka iti
GK19amaru_u:159: so'ṅgīkṛto bhagavatā makaradhvajena ||52||*vemabhūpālasya ṭīkāyāmeṣa ślokaḥ kevalaṃ labhyate|
GK19amaru_u:161: bāle nātha vimuñca mānini ruṣaṃ roṣān mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ
GK19amaru_u:162: khedo'smāsu na me'parādhyati bhavān sarve'parādhā mayi |
GK19amaru_u:163: tatkiṃ rodiṣi gadgadena vacasā kasyāgrato rudyate nanvetan mama kā tavāsmi dayitā nāsmītyato rudyate ||53||(57)
GK19amaru_u:165: nītvoccairvikṣipantaḥ kṛtatuhinakaṇāsārasaṅgān parāgān kaundān ānanditālīn atitarasurabhīn bhūriśo diṅmukheṣu |
GK19amaru_u:166: ete te kuṅkumāktastanakalasabharāsphālanād ucchalantaḥ pītvā śītkārivaktraṃ śiśuharidṛśāṃ haimanā vānti vātāḥ
GK19amaru_u:168: śrutvā tanvyā niśīthe navaghanarasitaṃ viślathāṅkaṃ patitvā śayyāyāṃ bhūmipṛṣṭhe karataladhṛtayā duḥkhitālījanena |
GK19amaru_u:169: sotkaṇṭhaṃ muktakaṇṭhaṃ kaṭhinakucataṭāghātaśīrṇāśrubindu smṛtvā smṛtvā priyasya skhalitamṛduvaco rudyate pānthabadhvā
GK19amaru_u:171: śliṣṭaḥ kaṇṭhe kimiti na mayā mūḍhayā prāṇanāthaś cumbatyasmin vadanavidhutiḥ kiṃ kṛtā kiṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:172: noktaḥ kasmād iti navavadhūceṣṭitaṃ cintayantī paścāttāpaṃ vahati taruṇī premṇi jāte rasajñā
GK19amaru_u:174: śrutvā nāmāpi yasya sphuṭaghanapulakaṃ jāyate'ṅgaṃ samantāt dṛṣṭvā yasyānanenduṃ bhavati vapuridaṃ candrakāntānukāri |
GK19amaru_u:175: tasminnāgatya kaṇṭhagrahaṇasarabhasasthāyini prāṇanāthe bhagnā mānasya cintā bhavati mama pnarvajramayyāḥ kadā nu ||57||(59)
GK19amaru_u:176: rāmāṇāṃ ramaṇīyavaktraśaśinaḥ svedodabindupluto vyālolālakavallarīṃ pracalayan dhunvan nitambāmbaram
GK19amaru_u:177: prātarvāti madhau prakāmavikasadrājīvarājīrajo jālāmodamanoharo ratirasaglāniṃ haranmārutaḥ
GK19amaru_u:181: antaḥpuṣpasugandhirārdrakavarī sarvāṅgalagnāmbaraṃ romāṇāṃ ramaṇīyatāṃ vidadhati grīṣmāparāhvāgame
GK19amaru_u:183: varamasau divaso na punarniśā nanu niśaiva varaṃ na punardivā |
GK19amaru_u:184: ubhayametad upaitvathavā kṣayaṃ priyajanena na yatra samāgamaḥ ||60||*rudramadevakumārasya ṭīkāyāmeṣa ślokaḥ kevalaṃ labhyate|
GK19amaru_u:185: lolairlocanavāribhiḥ saśapathaiḥ pādapraṇāmaiḥ priyair anyāstā vinivārayanti kṛpaṇāḥ prāṇeśvaraṃ prasthitam |
GK19amaru_u:186: puṇyāhaṃ vraja maṅgalaṃ sudivasaṃ prātaḥ prayātasya te yatsnehocitamīhitaṃ priyatama tvaṃ nirgataḥ śroṣyasi ||61||(61)
GK19amaru_u:189: no vā pādatale tayā nipatitaṃ tiṣṭheti noktaṃ vacaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:190: kāle kevalamambudātimaline gantuṃ pravṛttaḥ śaṭhaḥ tanvyā bāṣpajalaughakalpitanadīpūreṇa baddhaḥ priyaḥ ||62||(62)
GK19amaru_u:192: na jāne saṃmukhāyāte priyāṇi vadati priye |
GK19amaru_u:193: sarvāṇyaṅgāni me yānti śrotratāṃ kimu netratām ||63||(64)
GK19amaru_u:195: virahaviṣamaḥ kāmo vāmastanuṃ kurute tanuṃ divasagaṇanād akṣaścāsau vyapetaghṛṇo yamaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:196: tvamapi vaśago mānavyādhervicintaya nātha he kiśalayamṛdurjīved evaṃ kathaṃ pramadājanaḥ ||64||(67)
GK19amaru_u:198: pādāsakte suciramiha te vāmatā kaiva kānte sanmārgasthe praṇayini jane kopane ko'parādhaḥ
GK19amaru_u:199: itthaṃ tasyāḥ parjanakathā kopavegopaśāntau bāṣpodbhedaistad anu sahasā na sthitaṃ na prayātam
GK19amaru_u:200: purābhūdasmākaṃ niyatamavibhinnā tanuriyaṃ tato nu tvaṃ preyānvayamapi hatāśāḥ priyatamāḥ
GK19amaru_u:201: idānīṃ nāthastvaṃ vayamapi kalatraṃ kimaparaṃ mayāptaṃ prāṇānāṃ kuliśakaṭhinānāṃ phalamidam
GK19amaru_u:202: mugdhe mudghatayaiva netumakhilaḥ kālaḥ kimārabhyate mānaṃ dhatsva dhṛtiṃ vadhāna ṛjutāṃ dūre kuru preyasi |
GK19amaru_u:203: sakhyaivaṃ pratibodhitā prativacastāmāha bhītānanā nīceḥ śaṃsa hṛdi sthito nanu sa me prāṇeśvaraḥ śroṣyati ||67||(70)
GK19amaru_u:204: pīto yataḥ prabhṛti kāmapipāsitena tasyā mayādhararasaḥ pracuraḥ priyāyāḥ |
GK19amaru_u:205: tṛṣṇā tataḥ prabhṛti me dviguṇatvameti tāvaṇyamasti bahu tatra kimapi citram ||68|| *prakṣipto'yaṃ śloka iti arjunavarmadevamahāśayāḥ|
GK19amaru_u:206: kva prasthitāsi karabhoru ghane niśīthe prāṇādhiko vasati yatra janaḥ priyo me |
GK19amaru_u:207: ekākinī vada kathaṃ na bibheṣi bāle nanvasti puṅkhitaśaro madanaḥ sahāyaḥ ||69||(71)
GK19amaru_u:211: mugdhā kudmalitānanena dadhato vāyuṃ sthitā tasya sā bhrāntyā dhūrtatayā ca vepathumatī tenāniśaṃ cumbitā ||70||(72)
GK19amaru_u:212: sphuṭatu hṛdayaṃ kāmaṃ kāmaṃ karatu tanuṃ tanuṃ na sakhi caṭulapremṇā kāryaṃ punardayitena me |
GK19amaru_u:213: iti sarabhasaṃ mānāṭopād udīrya vacastayā ramaṇapadavī sāraṅgākṣyā saśaṅkitamīkṣitā ||71||
GK19amaru_u:215: gāḍhāśleṣaviśīrṇacandanarajaḥpuñjaprakarṣādiyaṃ śayyā samprati komalāṅgi paruṣetyāropya māṃ vakṣasi |
GK19amaru_u:218: kathamapi kṛtapratyākhyāne priye skhalitottare virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaṃ prakalpitamaśrutaṃ
GK19amaru_u:220: ādṛṣṭiprasarātpriyasya padavīmudvīkṣya nirviṇṇayā vicchinneṣu pathiṣvahaḥpariṇatau dhvānte samutsarpati |
GK19amaru_u:221: dattaikaṃ saśucā gṛhaṃ prati padaṃ pānthastriyāsminkṣaṇe mā bhūdāgata ityamandavalitagrīvaṃ punarvīkṣitam ||74||(76)
GK19amaru_u:222: āyāte dayite manorathaśatairnītvā kathaṃciddinaṃ vaidagdhyāpagamājjaḍe parijane dīrghāṃ kathāṃ kurvati |
GK19amaru_u:223: daṣṭāsmītyabhidhāya satvarapadaṃ vyādhūya cīnāṃśukaṃ tanvaṅgyā ratikātareṇa manasā nītaḥ pradīpaḥ śamam ||75||(77)
GK19amaru_u:227: yāsyāmiti samudyatasya gaditaṃ visrabdhamākarṇitaṃ gacchandūramupekṣito muhurasau vyāvṛtya tiṣṭhannapi |
GK19amaru_u:228: tacchūnye punarāsthitāsmi bhavane prāṇāsta ete dṛḍhāḥ sakhyastiṣṭhata jīvitavyasaninī dambhādahaṃ rodimi ||77||(79)
GK19amaru_u:229: śūnyaṃ vāsagṛhaṃ vilokya śayanādutthāya kiṃcicchanair nidrāvyājamupāgatasya suciraṃ nirvarṇya patyurmukham ||
GK19amaru_u:230: visrabdhaṃ paricumbya jātapulakāmālokya gaṇḍastalīṃ lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa hasatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā ||78||(82)
GK19amaru_u:231: loladbhrūlatayā vipakṣadigupanyāse'vadhūtaṃ śiras tadvṛttāntanirīkṣaṇe kṛtanamaskāro vilakṣaḥ sthitaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:232: kopāttāmrakapolabhittini mukhe dṛṣṭyā gataḥ pādayor utsṛṣṭo gurusannidhāvapi vidhirdvābhyāṃ na kālocitaḥ ||79||(83)
GK19amaru_u:233: jātā notkalikā stanau na lulitau gātraṃ na romāñcitaṃ vaktraṃ svedakaṇānvita na sahasā yāvacchaṭhenāmunā
GK19amaru_u:234: dṛṣṭenāva mano hṛtaṃ dhṛtimuṣā prāṇeśvareṇādya me tatkenātra nirūpyamāṇanipuṇo mānaḥ samādhīyatām
GK19amaru_u:235: dṛṣṭaḥ kātaranetrayā cirtaraṃ baddhāñjaliṃ yācit paścādaṃśukapallavena vidhṛto nirvyājamāliṅgitaḥ
GK19amaru_u:236: ityākṣipya yadā samastamaghṛṇo gantuṃ pravṛttaḥ śaṭhaḥ pūrvaṃ prāṇaparigraho dayitayā muktastato vallabhaḥ ||81||(85)
GK19amaru_u:237: kṛto dūrādeva smitamadhuramabhyudgamavidhiḥ śirasyājñā nyastā prativacanavatyānatimati |
GK19amaru_u:238: na dṛṣṭeḥ śaithilyaṃ milana iti ceto dahati me nigūḍhāntaḥkopātkaṭhiṇahṛdaye saṃvṛtiriyam
GK19amaru_u:239: ekasmiñśayane vipakṣaramaṇīnāmagrahe mugdhayā sadyaḥ kopaparāṅmukhaṃ śayitayā cāṭūni kurvannapi
GK19amaru_u:240: āvegādavadhīritaḥ priyatamastūṣṇīṃ sthitastatkṣaṇāt mā bhūssupta ivaiṣa mandavalitagrīvaṃ punarvīkṣitaḥ ||83||(22)
GK19amaru_u:241: malayamarutāṃ vrātā yātā vikāsitamallikā parimalabharo bhagno grīṣmastvamutsahase yadi |
GK19amaru_u:242: ghana ghaṭayituṃ nisnehaṃ tvāṃ ya eva nivartane prabhavati gavāṃ kinnaśchinnaṃ sa eva dhanañjayaḥ
GK19amaru_u:243: svaṃ dṛṣṭvā karajakṣataṃ madhumadakṣīvā vicāryerṣyayā gacchantī kva nu gacchasīti vidhṛtā bālā paṭānte mayā |
GK19amaru_u:244: pratyāvṛttamukhī sabāṣpanayanā māṃ muñca muñceti sā kopātprasphuritādharā yadavadattatkena vismaryate ||85||(55)
GK19amaru_u:246: kṣiptaṃ bhṛśaṃ kupitayā taralotpalākṣyā saubhāgyacihnamiva mūrdhni padaṃ vireje ||86|| *prakṣipto'yaṃ śloka iti arjunavarmadevamahāśayāḥ|
GK19amaru_u:247: kapole patrālī karatalanirodhena mṛditā nipīto niḥśvāsairayamamṛtahṛdyo'dhararasaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:248: muhuḥ kaṇṭhe lagnastaralayati bāṣpaḥ stanataṭaṃ priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe na tu vayam (anunayaḥ, su. 664, sad. 720, s.k.v. 489, subh. 1627)
GK19amaru_u:249: lākṣālakṣmalalāṭapaṭṭamabhitaḥ keyūramudrā gale vaktre kajjalakālimā nayanayorstāmbūlarāgo ghanaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:250: dṛṣṭā kopavidhāyi maṇḍanamidaṃ prātaściraṃ preyaso līlātāmarasodare mṛgadṛśaḥ śvāsāḥ samāptiṃ gatāḥ ||88|| (60)
GK19amaru_u:255: cintāmohaviniścalena manasā maunena pādānataḥ pratyākhyānaparāṅmukhaḥ priyatamo gantuṃ pravṛtto'dhunā
GK19amaru_u:257: tanvaṅgyā gurusannidhau nayanajaṃ yad vāri saṃstambhitaṃ tenāntargalitena manmathaśikhī sikto'nuṣaṅgodbhavaḥ
GK19amaru_u:258: manye tasya nirasyamānakiraṇasyaiṣā mukhenodgatā śvāsāmodasamākulālinikaravyājena dhūmāvaliḥ
GK19amaru_u:259: bhrūbhedo racitaḥ ciraṃ nayanayorabhyastamāmīlanaṃ roddhuṃ śikṣitamādareṇa hasitaṃ maune'bhiyogaḥ kṛtaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:260: dhairyaṃ kartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā baddho mānaparigrahe parikaraḥ siddhistu daivasthitā ||92||(97)*rūpagosvāmipādasya padyāvalyām (231) etasya ślokasyaiṣa rūpaḥ:
GK19amaru_u:261: bhrūbhaṅgo guṇitaściraṃ nayanayorabhyastamāmīlanaṃ roddhuṃ śikṣitamādareṇa hasitaṃ maune'bhiyogaḥ kṛtaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:262: dhairyaṃ kartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā baddho mānaparigrahe parikaraḥ siddhistu daive sthitā ||
GK19amaru_u:264: deśairantaritā śataiśca saritāmurvībhṛtāṃ kānanair yatnenāpi na yāti locanapathaṃ kānteti jānannapi |
GK19amaru_u:265: udgrīvaścaraṇārdharuddhavasudhaḥ kṛtvāśrupūrṇāṃ dṛśaṃ tāmāśāṃ pathikastathāpi kimapi dhyāyaṃściraṃ vīkṣate ||93|| (99)
GK19amaru_u:267: mlānaṃ pāṇḍu kṛśaṃ viyogavidhuraṃ lambālakaṃ sālasaṃ bhūyastatkṣaṇajātakānti rabhasaprāpte mayi proṣite |
GK19amaru_u:268: sāṭopaṃ ratikelikālasarasaṃ ramyaṃ kimapyādarād yatpītaṃ sutanormayā vadanakaṃ vaktuṃ na tatpāryate
GK19amaru_u:269: saivāhaṃ pramadā nṛṇāmadhigatāvetau ca tau nūpurāv eṣāsmākamavṛttireva sahajavrīḍādhanaḥ strījanaḥ
GK19amaru_u:270: itthaṃ lajjitayā smṛterupagame matvā tanuṃ sambhramāt pumbhāvaḥ prathamaṃ rativyatikare muktastato vallabhaḥ ||95||(89)
GK19amaru_u:271: karakisalayaṃ dhūtvā dhūtvā vimārgati vāsasī kṣipati sumanomālāśeṣaṃ pradīpaśikhāṃ prati |
GK19amaru_u:272: sthagayati muhuḥ patyurnetre vihasya samākulā surataviratā ramyā tanvī muhurmuhurīkṣate ||96||(90)
GK19amaru_u:273: santyevātra gṛhe gṛhe yuvatayastāḥ pṛccha gatvādhunā preyāṃsaḥ praṇamanti kiṃ tava punardāso yathā vartate |
GK19amaru_u:274: ātmadrohiṇi durjanaiḥ pralapitaṃ karṇe'niśaṃ mā kṛthāś chinnasneharasā bhavanti puruṣā duḥkhānuvartyāḥ punaḥ ||97||(91)
GK19amaru_u:275: niḥśvāsā vadanaṃ dahanti hṛdayaṃ nirmūlamunmathyate nidrā neti na dṛśyate priyamukhaṃ rātrindivaṃ rudyate |
GK19amaru_u:276: aṅgaṃ śoṣamupaiti pādapatitaḥ preyāṃstathopekṣitaḥ sakhyaḥ kaṃ guṇamākalayya dayite mānaṃ vayaṃ kāritāḥ ||98|| (92)
GK19amaru_u:278: adyārabhya yadi priye punarahaṃ mānasya vā'nyasya vā gṛhṇīyāṃ śaṭhadurnayena manasā nāmāpi saṃkṣepataḥ |
GK19amaru_u:279: tattenaiva vinā śaśāṅkadhavalāḥ spaṣṭāṭṭahāsā niśā eko vā divasaḥ payodamalino yāyānmama prāvṛṣi
GK19amaru_u:280: idaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ priyatama tanu śvetamatha kiṃ gamiṣyāmo yāmo bhavatu gamanenātha bhavatu
GK19amaru_u:281: purā yenāvaṃ me ciramanusṛtā cittapadavī sa evānyo jātaḥ sakhi paricitāḥ kasya puruṣāḥ ||100||(94)
GK19amaru_u:283: iti hi capalo mānārambhastathāpi hi notsahe hṛdayadayitaḥ kāntaḥ kāmaṃ kimatra karomyaham
GK19amaru_u:284: ahaṃ tenāhūtā kimapi kathayāmīti vijane samīpe cāsīnā sarasahṛdayatvādavahitā |
GK19amaru_u:285: tataḥ karṇopānte kimapi vadatāghrāya vadanaṃ gṛhītā dharmille sakhi sa ca mayā gāḍhamadhare
GK19amaru_u:286: cakṣuḥprītiprasakte manasi paricaye cintyamānābhyupāye rāge yāte'tibhūmiṃ vikasati sutarāṃ gocare dūtikāyāḥ |
GK19amaru_u:287: āstāṃ dūreṇa tāvatsarabhasadayitāliṅganānandalābhas tadgehopāntarathyābhramaṇamapi parāṃ nirvṛtiṃ santanoti ||103||(100)
GK19amaru_u:288: kānte talpamupāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ bandhanād vāso viślathamekhalāguṇadhṛtaṃ kiṃcinnitambe sthitam |
GK19amaru_u:289: etāvatsakhi vedmi sāmpratamahaṃ tasyāṅgasaṅge punaḥ ko'yaṃ kāsmi rataṃ nu vā kathamiti svalpāpi me na smṛtiḥ ||104||(101)
GK19amaru_u:290: prāsāde sā diśi diśi ca sā pṛṣṭhataḥ sā puraḥ sā paryaṅke sā pathi pathi ca sā tadviyogāturasya
GK19amaru_u:291: haṃho cetaḥ prakṛtiraparā nāsti me kāpi sā sā sā sā sā sā jagati sakale ko'yamadvaitavādaḥ
GK19amaru_u:292: anālocya premṇaḥ pariṇatimanādṛtya suhṛdas tvayākāṇḍe mānaḥ kimiti sarale preyasi kṛtaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:293: samākṛṣṭā hyete virahadahanodbhāsuraśikhāḥ svahastenāṅgārāstad alamadhunāraṇyaruditaiḥ ||112 (subh. 1170; sad. 2.42.1, sū. 56.9, su. 659)
GK19amaru_u:294: Verses found in Arjunavarmadeva's version not found here aṅgulyagranakhena bāṣpasalilaṃ vikṣipya vikṣipya kiṃ
GK19amaru_u:295: tūṣṇīṃ rodiṣi kopane bahutaraṃ phūtkṛtya rodiṣyasi |
GK19amaru_u:298: tadvaktrābhimukhaṃ mukhaṃ vinamitaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā pādayos tasyālāpakutūhalākulatare śrotre niruddhe mayā |
GK19amaru_u:299: pāṇibhyāṃ ca tiraskṛtaḥ sapulakaḥ svedodgamo gaṇḍayoḥ sakhyaḥ kiṃ karavāṇi yānti śatadhā yatkañcuke sandhayaḥ ||(11)
GK19amaru_u:300: nāpeto'nunayena yaḥ priyasuhṛdvākyairna yaḥ saṃhṛto yo dīrghaṃ divasaṃ viṣahya viṣamaṃ yatnātkathaṃciddhṛtaḥ
GK19amaru_u:301: anyonyasya hṛte mukhe nihitayostiryakkathaṃciddṛśoḥ sa dvābhyāmativismṛtavyatikaro māno vihasyojjhitaḥ
GK19amaru_u:302: rātrau vāribharālasāmbudaravodvignena jātāśruṇā pānthenātmaviyogaduḥkhapiśunaṃ gītaṃ tathotkaṇṭhayā
GK19amaru_u:303: āstāṃ jīvitahāriṇaḥ pravasanālāpasya saṃkīrtanaṃ mānasyāpi jalāñjaliḥ sarabhasaṃ lokena datto yathā ||(54)
GK19amaru_u:304: capalahṛdayae kiṃ svātantryāttathā gṛhamāgataś caraṇapatitaḥ premārdrārdraḥ priyaḥ samupekṣitaḥ
GK19amaru_u:305: tadidamadhunā yāvajjīvaṃ nirastasukhodayā ruditaśaraṇā durjātānāṃ sahasva ruṣāṃ phalam ||(56)
GK19amaru_u:306: āstāṃ viśvasanaṃ sakhīṣu viditābhiprāyasāre jane tatrāpyarpayituṃ dṛśaṃ suracitāṃ śaknomi na vrīḍayā |
GK19amaru_u:308: mātaḥ kaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi hṛdaye jīrṇo'nurāgānalaḥ ||(63)
GK19amaru_u:310: svabhāvaśobhānatimātrabhūṣaṇā tanustaveyaṃ bata kiṃ nu sundari ||(65)
GK19amaru_u:312: na kiṃcidityeva jagāda yadvadhūḥ kiyanna tenaiva tayāsya varṇitam ||(66)
GK19amaru_u:317: Text ābbreviations This edition is based on the one in Kāvya-saṅgraha edited by Jīvānanda Vidyāsāgara. īt has been compared with the
GK19amaru_u:318: Motilal Banarsidass edition (1983) containing the commentary of
GK19amaru_u:319: Arjunavarmadeva. The number in parentheses at the end of the last line of each verse is the number of the verse in the Motilal edition.
GK19amaru_u:320: There seems to be a great deal of variation in the order and numbering of the verses between the editions and the commentators. The order of
GK19amaru_u:321: the verses found in the Kāvya-saṅgraha forms the backbone
GK19amaru_u:322: of the order of the verses presented here, even though Arjunavarmadeva
GK19amaru_u:323: considers some of the verses found in that edition to be interpolations. Those suspect verses have been noted in the footnotes.
GK19amaru_u:324: The parentheses in between verses contain citations for the major
GK19amaru_u:325: anthologies. These have been taken from Sures Chandra Banerji's
GK19amaru_u:326: edition of Srīdharadāsa's Sadukti-karṇāmṛta. The abbreviations for those anthologies are the
GK19amaru_u:333: (These equivalences have been taken from the Banerji edition of
GK19amaru_u:334: Sadukti-karṇāmṛta and the De edition of Padyāvalī}.)
GK19amaru_u:343: āliṅgan yo'vadhūtastripurayuvatibhiḥ sāśrunetrotpalābhiḥ kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ ||2||(2)
GK19amaru_u:345: ālolāmalakāvalīṃ vilulitāṃ bibhraccalatkuṇḍalaṃ kiñcinmṛṣṭaviśeṣakaṃ tanutaraiḥ khedāmbhasāṃ śīkaraiḥ |
GK19amaru_u:346: tanvyā yatsuratāntatāntanayanaṃ vaktraṃ rativyatyaye tattvāṃ pātu cirāya kiṃ hariharabrahmādibhirdaivataiḥ
GK19amaru_u:349: hṛdayanihitaṃ bhāvākūtaṃ vamadbhirivekṣaṇaiḥ kathaya sukṛtī ko'yaṃ mugdhe tvayādya vilokyate
GK19amaru_u:351: datto'syāḥ praṇayastvayaiva bhavatā ceyaṃ ciraṃ lālitā daivād adya kila tvameva kṛtavān asyā navaṃ vipriyam |
GK19amaru_u:352: manyurduḥsaha eṣa yātyupaśamaṃ no sāntvavādaiḥ sphuṭaṃ he nistraṃśa vimuktakaṇṭhakaruṇaṃ tāvatsakhī roditu ||5||(6)
GK19amaru_u:353: likhannāste bhūmiṃ bahiravanataḥ prāṇadayito nirāhārāḥ skahyaḥ satataruditocchūṇanayanāḥ |
GK19amaru_u:354: parityaktaṃ sarvaṃ hasitapaṭhitaṃ pañjaraśukais tavāvasthā ceyaṃ visṛja kaṭhine mānamadhunā
GK19amaru_u:356: nāryastanvi haṭhāddharanti ramaṇaṃ tiṣṭhanti no vāritās tatkiṃ tāmyasi kiṃ ca rodiṣi mudhā tāsāṃ priyaṃ mā kṛthāḥ |
GK19amaru_u:357: kāntaḥ keliruciryuvā sahṛdayastādṛkpatiḥ kātarae kiṃ no barkarakarkaraiḥ priyaśatairākramya vikrīyate ||7||(8)
GK19amaru_u:359: nāryo mugdhaśaṭhā haranti ramaṇaṃ tiṣṭhanti no vāritās kopātkomalalolabāhulatikāpāśena baddhā dṛḍhaṃ nītvā keliniketanaṃ dayitayā sāyaṃ sakhīnāṃ puraḥ |
GK19amaru_u:360: bhūyo'pyevamiti skhalan mṛdugirā saṃsūcya duśceṣṭitaṃ dhanyo hanyata eva nihnutiparaḥ preyān rudatyā hasan ||8||(9)
GK19amaru_u:364: iti dinaśataprāpyaṃ deśaṃ priyasya yiyāsato harati gamanaṃ bālālāpaiḥ sabāṣpagalajjalaiḥ ||9||(12)
GK19amaru_u:366: yātāḥ kiṃ na milanti sundari punaścintā tvayā matkṛte no kāryā nitarāṃ kṛśāmi kathayatyevaṃ sabāṣpe mayi |
GK19amaru_u:367: lajjāmantharatārakeṇa nipataddhārāśruṇā cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā māṃ hāsitena bhāvimaraṇotsāhastayā sūcitaḥ ||10||(10)
GK19amaru_u:368: dhīraṃ vāridharasya vāri kirataḥ śrutvā niśīthe dhvaniṃ dīrghocchvāsamudaśruṇā virahiṇīṃ bālāṃ ciraṃ dhyāyatā |
GK19amaru_u:369: adhvanyena vimuktakaṇṭhamakhilāṃ rātriṃ tathā kranditaṃ grāmīṇairvrajato janasya vasatirgrāme niṣiddhā yathā ||11||(13)
GK19amaru_u:371: kathamapi sakhi krīḍākopād vrajeti mayodite kaṭhinahṛdayastyaktvā śayyāṃ balād gata eva saḥ
GK19amaru_u:372: iti sarabhasaṃ dhvastapremṇi vyapetaghṛṇe jane punarapi hatavrīḍaṃ cetaḥ prayāti karomi kim
GK19amaru_u:373: dampatyorniśi jalpatorgṛhaśukenākarṇitaṃ yadvacas tatprātargurusannidhau nigadatastasyopahāraṃ vadhūḥ |
GK19amaru_u:374: karṇālaṅkṛtipadmarāgaśakalaṃ vinyasya cañcūpuṭe vrīḍārtā prakaroti dāḍimaphalavyājena vāgbandhanam
GK19amaru_u:376: ajñānena parāṅmukhīṃ paribhavād āśliṣya māṃ duḥkhitāṃ kiṃ labdhaṃ caṭula tvayeha nayatā saubhāgyametāṃ daśām |
GK19amaru_u:379: ekatrāsanasaṃsthitiḥ parihatā pratudgamād dūratas tāmbūlānayanacchalena rabhasāśelṣo'pi saṃvighnitaḥ
GK19amaru_u:380: ālāpo'pi na miśritaḥ parijanaṃ vyāpārayantyāntike kāntaṃ pratyupacārataścaturayā kopaḥ kṛtārthīkṛtaḥ (māninī, sad. 692, rasārṇavasudhākara 2.67g)
GK19amaru_u:381: dṛṣṭvaikāsanasaṃsthite priyatame paścād upetyādarād ekasyā nayane pidyāya vihitakrīḍānubandhacchalaḥ
GK19amaru_u:382: īṣadvakrimakandharaḥ sapulakaḥ premollasanmānasām antarhāsalasatkapolaphalakāṃ dhūrto'parāṃ cumbati ||16||(19)
GK19amaru_u:385: vrajati ramaṇe niḥśvasyoccaiḥ stanasthitahastayā nayanasalilacchannā dṛṣṭiḥ sakhīṣu niveśitā
GK19amaru_u:387: kāñcyā gāḍhatarāvaruddhavasanaprāntā kimarthaṃ punar mugdhākṣī svaiptīti tatparijanaṃ svairaṃ priye pṛcchati |
GK19amaru_u:388: mātaḥ svaptumapīha vārayati māmityāhitakrodhayā paryasya svapiticchalena śayane datto'vakāśastayā
GK19amaru_u:390: ekasmiñśayane parāṅmukhatayā vītottaraṃ tāmyator anyonyasya hṛdi sthite'pyanunaye saṃrakṣatorgauravam
GK19amaru_u:391: dampatyoḥ śanakairapāṅgavalanān miśrībhavaccakṣuṣor bhagno mānakaliḥ sahāsarabhasaṃ vyāsaktakaṇṭhagraham
GK19amaru_u:393: paśyāmo mayi kiṃ prapadyata iti sthairyaṃ mayālambitaṃ kiṃ māmālapatītyayaṃ khala śaṭhaḥ kopastayāpyāśritaḥ
GK19amaru_u:394: ityanyonyavilakṣadṛṣṭicature tasminnavasthāntare savyājaṃ hasitaṃ mayā dhṛtiharo bāṣpastu muktastayā ||20||(24)
GK19amaru_u:396: parimlāne māne mukhaśaśini tasyāḥ karadhṛte mayi kṣīṇopāye praṇipatanamātraikaśaraṇe |
GK19amaru_u:397: tayā pakṣmaprāntavrajapuṭaniruddhena sahasā prasādo bāṣpena stanataṭaviśīrṇena kathitaḥ ||21||(25)
GK19amaru_u:400: ityukte kva tad ityudīrya sahasā tatsampramārṣṭuṃ mayā sāśliṣṭā rabhasena tatsukhavaśāttanvyāpi tad vismṛtam ||22||(26)
GK19amaru_u:401: tvaṃ mugdhākṣi vinaiva kañculikayā dhatse manohāriṇīṃ lakṣmīmityabhidhāyini priyatame tadvīṭikāṃ saṃspṛśi |
GK19amaru_u:403: bhrūbhaṅge racite'pi dṛṣṭiradhikaṃ sotkaṇṭhamudvīkṣate kārkaśyaṃ gamite'pi cetasi tanūromāñcamālambate
GK19amaru_u:404: ruddhāyāmapi vāci sasmitamidaṃ dagdhānanaṃ jāyate dṛṣṭe nirvahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati kathaṃ mānasya tasmiñjane ||24||(28)
GK19amaru_u:406: kānte katyapi vāsarāṇi gamaya tvaṃ mīlayitvā dṛśau svasti svasti nimīlayāmi nayane yāvan na śūnyā diśaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:407: āyātā vayamāgamiṣyati suhṛdvargasya bhāgyodayaiḥ sandeśo vada kastavābhilaṣitastīrtheṣu toyāñjaliḥ
GK19amaru_u:409: sā patyuḥ prathamāparādhasamaye sakhyopadeśaṃ vinā no jānāti savibhramāṅgavalanāvakroktisaṃsūcanam
GK19amaru_u:410: svacchairacchakapolamūlagalitaiḥ paryastanetrotpalā bālā kevalameva roditi luṭhallolālakairaśrubhiḥ
GK19amaru_u:412: bhavatu viditaṃ chadmālāpairalaṃ priya gamyatāṃ tanurapi na te doṣo'smākaṃ vidhistu parāṅmukhaḥ
GK19amaru_u:413: tava yathā tathābhūtaṃ prema prapannamimāṃ daśāṃ prakṛticapale kā naḥ pīḍā gate hatajīvite
GK19amaru_u:415: urasi nihitastāro hāraḥ kṛtā jaghane ghane kalakalavatī kāñcī pādau kvaṇanmaṇinūpurau |
GK19amaru_u:416: priyamabhisarasyevaṃ mugdhe samāhataḍiṇḍimā yadi kimadhikatrāsotkampaṃ diśaḥ samudīkṣase ||28||(31)
GK19amaru_u:417: prātaḥ prātarupāgatena janitā nirnidritā cakṣuṣor mandāyāṃ mayi gauravavyapagamād utpāditaṃ lāghavam |
GK19amaru_u:418: kiṃ mugdhe na mayā kṛtaṃ ramaṇadhīrmuktā tvayā gamyatāṃ dusthaṃ tiṣṭhasi yacca pathyamadhunā kartāsmi tacchroṣyasi ||29||(33)
GK19amaru_u:419: sā bālā vayamapragalbhamanasaḥ sā strī vayaṃ kātarāḥ sā pīnonnatimatpayodharayugaṃ dhatte sakhedā vayam |
GK19amaru_u:420: sākrāntā jaghanasthalena guruṇā gantuṃ na śaktā vayaṃ doṣairanyajanāśritairapaṭavo jātāḥ sma ityadbhutam ||30||(34)
GK19amaru_u:422: prasthānaṃ valayaiḥ kṛtaṃ priyasakhairajasraṃ gataṃ dhṛtyā na kṣaṇamāsitaṃ vyavasitaṃ cittena gantuṃ puraḥ |
GK19amaru_u:423: gantuṃ niścitacetasi priyatame sarve samaṃ prasthitā gantavye sati jīvitapriyasuhṛtsārthaḥ kimu tyajyate ||31||(35)
GK19amaru_u:425: sandaṣṭādharapallavā sacakitaṃ hastāgramādhunvatī māmāmuñca śaṭheti kopavacanairānartitabhrūlatā
GK19amaru_u:426: śītkārāñcitalocanā sarabhasaṃ yaiścumbitā māninī prāptaṃ tairamṛtaṃ mudhaiva mathito mūḍhaiḥ suraiḥ sāgaraḥ ||32||(36)
GK19amaru_u:429: premāvāsitayā mayā saralayā nyastaṃ mukhaṃ tanmukhe |
GK19amaru_u:430: jñāte'līkanimīlane nayanayordhūrtasya romāñcito lajjāsīn mama tena sāpyapahṛtā tatkālayogyaiḥ kramaiḥ ||33||(37)
GK19amaru_u:431: kopo yatra bhrūkuṭiracanā nigraho yatra maunaṃ yatrānyonyasmitamanunayo yatra dṛṣṭiḥ prasādaḥ
GK19amaru_u:432: tasya premṇastad idamadhunā vaiṣamaṃ paśya jātaṃ tvaṃ pādānte luṭhasi nahi me manyumokṣaḥ khalāyāḥ ||34||(38)
GK19amaru_u:434: sutanu jahihi kopaṃ paśya pādānataṃ māṃ na khalu tava kadācitkopa evaṃ vidho'bhūt |
GK19amaru_u:435: iti nigadati nāthe tiryagāmīlitākṣyā nayanajalamanalpaṃ muktamuktaṃ na kiñcit ||35||(39)
GK19amaru_u:438: mā mā mānada māti māmalamiti kṣāmākṣarollāpinī suptā kiṃ nu mṛtā nu kiṃ manasi me līnā vilīnā nu kim ||36||(40)
GK19amaru_u:439: paṭālagne patyau namayati mukhaṃ jātavinayā haṭhāśleṣaṃ vāñchatyapaharati gātrāṇi nibhṛtam
GK19amaru_u:440: na śaknotyākhyātuṃ smitamukhasakhīdattanayanā hriyā tāmyatyantaḥ prathamaparihāse navavadhūḥ
GK19amaru_u:442: gate premābandhe praṇayabahumāne vigalite nivṛtte sadbhāve jana iva jane gacchati puraḥ |
GK19amaru_u:443: tad utprekṣyotprekṣya priyasakhi gatāṃstāṃśca divasān na jāne ko heturdalati śatadhā yan na hṛdayam ||38||(43)
GK19amaru_u:447: kathamapi dine dīrghe yāte niśāmadhirūḍhayoḥ prasarati kathā bahvī yūnoryathā na tathā ratiḥ
GK19amaru_u:448: dīrghā vandanamālikā viracitā hṛṣṭyaiva nendīvaraiḥ puṣpāṇāṃ prakaraḥ smitena racito no kundajātyādibhiḥ
GK19amaru_u:449: dattaḥ svedamucā payodharayuge nārghyo na kumbhāmbhasā svairevāvayavaiḥ priyasya viśatastanvyā kṛtaṃ maṅgalam ||40||(45)
GK19amaru_u:450: kānte sāgasi śāyite priyasakhīveśaṃ vidhāyāgate bhrāntyāliṅgya mayā rahasyamuditaṃ tatsaṅgamākāṅkṣayā
GK19amaru_u:451: mugdhe duṣkarametad ityatitarāmuktvā sahāsaṃ balād āliṅgya chalitāsmi tena kitavenādya pradoṣāgame
GK19amaru_u:452: āśaṅkya praṇatiṃ paṭāntapihitau pādau karotyādarāt vyājenāgatamāvṛṇoti hasitaṃ na spaṣṭamudvīkṣate
GK19amaru_u:453: mayyālāpavati pratīpavacanaṃ sakhyā sahābhāṣate tasyāstiṣṭhatu nirbharapraṇayitā māno'pi ramyodayaḥ
GK19amaru_u:455: sā yāvanti padānyalīkavacanairālījanaiḥ śikṣitā tāvantyeva kṛtāgaso drutataraṃ vyāhṛtya patyuḥ puraḥ |
GK19amaru_u:456: prārabdhā purato yathā manasijasyājñā tathā vartituṃ premṇo maugdhyavibhūṣaṇasya sahajaḥ ko'pyeṣa kāntaḥ kramaḥ ||43||(48)
GK19amaru_u:457: dūrādutsukamāgate vivalitaṃ sambhāṣiṇi sphāritaṃ saṃśliṣyatyaruṇaṃ gṛhītavasane kiñcin natabhrūlatam
GK19amaru_u:458: māninyāścaraṇānativyatikare bāṣpāmbupūrṇekṣaṇaṃ cakṣurjātamaho prapañcacaturaṃ jātāgasi preyasi
GK19amaru_u:459: aṅgānāmatitānavaṃ kathamidaṃ kampaśca kasmātkuto mugdhe pāṇḍukapolamānanamiti prāṇeśvare pṛcchati
GK19amaru_u:460: tanvyā sarvamidaṃ svabhāvajamiti vyāhṛtya pakṣmāntara vyāpī bāṣpabharastayā calitayā niḥśvasya mukto'nyataḥ ||45||(50)
GK19amaru_u:461: purastanvyā gotraskhalanacakito'haṃ natamukhaḥ pravṛtto vailakṣyātkimapi likhituṃ daivahatakaḥ
GK19amaru_u:462: sphuṭo rekhānyāsaḥ kathamapi sa tādṛk pariṇato gatā yena vyaktaṃ punaravayavaiḥ saiva taruṇī
GK19amaru_u:465: aho citraṃ citraṃ sphuṭamiti nigadyāśrukaluṣaṃ ruṣā brahmāstraṃ me śarasi nihito vāmacaraṇaḥ
GK19amaru_u:467: kaṭhinahṛdaye muñca bhrāntiṃ vyalīkakathāśritāṃ piśunavacanairdukhaṃ netuṃ na yuktamimaṃ janam
GK19amaru_u:468: kimidamathavā satyaṃ mugdhe tvayā hi viniścitaṃ yad abhirucitaṃ tan me kṛtvā priye sukhamāsyatām
GK19amaru_u:470: karmavyagrakuṭumbinīkucataṭasvedacchidaḥ prāvṛṣaḥ prārambhe nipatanti kandaladalollāsāḥ payobindavaḥ
GK19amaru_u:472: pītastuṣārakiraṇo madhunaiva sārdham antaḥ praviśya caṣake pratibimbavartī |
GK19amaru_u:473: mānāndhakāramapi mānavatījanasya nūnaṃ bibheda yad asau prasasāda sadyaḥ ||49||
GK19amaru_u:476: nabhasi jaladalakṣmīṃ sambhṛtāṃ vīkṣya diṣṭyā prasarasi yadi kāntetyardhamuktvā kathañcit
GK19amaru_u:477: mama paṭamavalambya prollikhantī dharitrīṃ tadanukṛtavatī sā yatra vāco nivṛttāḥ ||50||
GK19amaru_u:487: bāle nātha vimuñca mānini ruṣaṃ roṣān mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ
GK19amaru_u:488: khedo'smāsu na me'parādhyati bhavān sarve'parādhā mayi |
GK19amaru_u:489: tatkiṃ rodiṣi gadgadena vacasā kasyāgrato rudyate nanvetan mama kā tavāsmi dayitā nāsmītyato rudyate ||53||(57)
GK19amaru_u:491: nītvoccairvikṣipantaḥ kṛtatuhinakaṇāsārasaṅgān parāgān kaundān ānanditālīn atitarasurabhīn bhūriśo diṅmukheṣu |
GK19amaru_u:492: ete te kuṅkumāktastanakalasabharāsphālanād ucchalantaḥ pītvā śītkārivaktraṃ śiśuharidṛśāṃ haimanā vānti vātāḥ||54||
GK19amaru_u:494: śrutvā tanvyā niśīthe navaghanarasitaṃ viślathāṅkaṃ patitvā śayyāyāṃ bhūmipṛṣṭhe karataladhṛtayā duḥkhitālījanena |
GK19amaru_u:495: sotkaṇṭhaṃ muktakaṇṭhaṃ kaṭhinakucataṭāghātaśīrṇāśrubindu smṛtvā smṛtvā priyasya skhalitamṛduvaco rudyate pānthabadhvā ||55||
GK19amaru_u:497: śliṣṭaḥ kaṇṭhe kimiti na mayā mūḍhayā prāṇanāthaś cumbatyasmin vadanavidhutiḥ kiṃ kṛtā kiṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:498: noktaḥ kasmād iti navavadhūceṣṭitaṃ cintayantī paścāttāpaṃ vahati taruṇī premṇi jāte rasajñā
GK19amaru_u:500: śrutvā nāmāpi yasya sphuṭaghanapulakaṃ jāyate'ṅgaṃ samantāt dṛṣṭvā yasyānanenduṃ bhavati vapuridaṃ candrakāntānukāri |
GK19amaru_u:501: tasminnāgatya kaṇṭhagrahaṇasarabhasasthāyini prāṇanāthe bhagnā mānasya cintā bhavati mama pnarvajramayyāḥ kadā nu ||57||(59)
GK19amaru_u:502: rāmāṇāṃ ramaṇīyavaktraśaśinaḥ svedodabindupluto vyālolālakavallarīṃ pracalayan dhunvan nitambāmbaram
GK19amaru_u:503: prātarvāti madhau prakāmavikasadrājīvarājīrajo jālāmodamanoharo ratirasaglāniṃ haranmārutaḥ
GK19amaru_u:507: antaḥpuṣpasugandhirārdrakavarī sarvāṅgalagnāmbaraṃ romāṇāṃ ramaṇīyatāṃ vidadhati grīṣmāparāhvāgame
GK19amaru_u:509: varamasau divaso na punarniśā nanu niśaiva varaṃ na punardivā |
GK19amaru_u:510: ubhayametad upaitvathavā kṣayaṃ priyajanena na yatra samāgamaḥ ||60||
GK19amaru_u:512: lolairlocanavāribhiḥ saśapathaiḥ pādapraṇāmaiḥ priyair anyāstā vinivārayanti kṛpaṇāḥ prāṇeśvaraṃ prasthitam |
GK19amaru_u:513: puṇyāhaṃ vraja maṅgalaṃ sudivasaṃ prātaḥ prayātasya te yatsnehocitamīhitaṃ priyatama tvaṃ nirgataḥ śroṣyasi ||61||(61)
GK19amaru_u:516: no vā pādatale tayā nipatitaṃ tiṣṭheti noktaṃ vacaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:517: kāle kevalamambudātimaline gantuṃ pravṛttaḥ śaṭhaḥ tanvyā bāṣpajalaughakalpitanadīpūreṇa baddhaḥ priyaḥ ||62||(62)
GK19amaru_u:519: na jāne saṃmukhāyāte priyāṇi vadati priye |
GK19amaru_u:520: sarvāṇyaṅgāni me yānti śrotratāṃ kimu netratām ||63||(64)
GK19amaru_u:522: virahaviṣamaḥ kāmo vāmastanuṃ kurute tanuṃ divasagaṇanād akṣaścāsau vyapetaghṛṇo yamaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:523: tvamapi vaśago mānavyādhervicintaya nātha he kiśalayamṛdurjīved evaṃ kathaṃ pramadājanaḥ ||64||(67)
GK19amaru_u:525: pādāsakte suciramiha te vāmatā kaiva kānte sanmārgasthe praṇayini jane kopane ko'parādhaḥ
GK19amaru_u:526: itthaṃ tasyāḥ parjanakathā kopavegopaśāntau bāṣpodbhedaistad anu sahasā na sthitaṃ na prayātam
GK19amaru_u:527: purābhūdasmākaṃ niyatamavibhinnā tanuriyaṃ tato nu tvaṃ preyānvayamapi hatāśāḥ priyatamāḥ
GK19amaru_u:528: idānīṃ nāthastvaṃ vayamapi kalatraṃ kimaparaṃ mayāptaṃ prāṇānāṃ kuliśakaṭhinānāṃ phalamidam
GK19amaru_u:529: mugdhe mudghatayaiva netumakhilaḥ kālaḥ kimārabhyate mānaṃ dhatsva dhṛtiṃ vadhāna ṛjutāṃ dūre kuru preyasi |
GK19amaru_u:530: sakhyaivaṃ pratibodhitā prativacastāmāha bhītānanā nīceḥ śaṃsa hṛdi sthito nanu sa me prāṇeśvaraḥ śroṣyati ||67||(70)
GK19amaru_u:531: pīto yataḥ prabhṛti kāmapipāsitena tasyā mayādhararasaḥ pracuraḥ priyāyāḥ |
GK19amaru_u:532: tṛṣṇā tataḥ prabhṛti me dviguṇatvameti tāvaṇyamasti bahu tatra kimapi citram ||68||
GK19amaru_u:534: kva prasthitāsi karabhoru ghane niśīthe prāṇādhiko vasati yatra janaḥ priyo me |
GK19amaru_u:535: ekākinī vada kathaṃ na bibheṣi bāle nanvasti puṅkhitaśaro madanaḥ sahāyaḥ ||69||(71)
GK19amaru_u:539: mugdhā kudmalitānanena dadhato vāyuṃ sthitā tasya sā bhrāntyā dhūrtatayā ca vepathumatī tenāniśaṃ cumbitā ||70||(72)
GK19amaru_u:540: sphuṭatu hṛdayaṃ kāmaṃ kāmaṃ karatu tanuṃ tanuṃ na sakhi caṭulapremṇā kāryaṃ punardayitena me |
GK19amaru_u:541: iti sarabhasaṃ mānāṭopād udīrya vacastayā ramaṇapadavī sāraṅgākṣyā saśaṅkitamīkṣitā ||71||(73)
GK19amaru_u:543: gāḍhāśleṣaviśīrṇacandanarajaḥpuñjaprakarṣādiyaṃ śayyā samprati komalāṅgi paruṣetyāropya māṃ vakṣasi |
GK19amaru_u:546: kathamapi kṛtapratyākhyāne priye skhalitottare virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaṃ prakalpitamaśrutaṃ
GK19amaru_u:548: ādṛṣṭiprasarātpriyasya padavīmudvīkṣya nirviṇṇayā vicchinneṣu pathiṣvahaḥpariṇatau dhvānte samutsarpati |
GK19amaru_u:549: dattaikaṃ saśucā gṛhaṃ prati padaṃ pānthastriyāsminkṣaṇe mā bhūdāgata ityamandavalitagrīvaṃ punarvīkṣitam ||74||(76)
GK19amaru_u:550: āyāte dayite manorathaśatairnītvā kathaṃciddinaṃ vaidagdhyāpagamājjaḍe parijane dīrghāṃ kathāṃ kurvati |
GK19amaru_u:551: daṣṭāsmītyabhidhāya satvarapadaṃ vyādhūya cīnāṃśukaṃ tanvaṅgyā ratikātareṇa manasā nītaḥ pradīpaḥ śamam ||75||(77)
GK19amaru_u:555: yāsyāmiti samudyatasya gaditaṃ visrabdhamākarṇitaṃ gacchandūramupekṣito muhurasau vyāvṛtya tiṣṭhannapi |
GK19amaru_u:556: tacchūnye punarāsthitāsmi bhavane prāṇāsta ete dṛḍhāḥ sakhyastiṣṭhata jīvitavyasaninī dambhādahaṃ rodimi ||77||(79)
GK19amaru_u:557: śūnyaṃ vāsagṛhaṃ vilokya śayanādutthāya kiṃcicchanair nidrāvyājamupāgatasya suciraṃ nirvarṇya patyurmukham ||
GK19amaru_u:558: visrabdhaṃ paricumbya jātapulakāmālokya gaṇḍastalīṃ lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa hasatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā ||78||(82)
GK19amaru_u:559: loladbhrūlatayā vipakṣadigupanyāse'vadhūtaṃ śiras tadvṛttāntanirīkṣaṇe kṛtanamaskāro vilakṣaḥ sthitaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:560: kopāttāmrakapolabhittini mukhe dṛṣṭyā gataḥ pādayor utsṛṣṭo gurusannidhāvapi vidhirdvābhyāṃ na kālocitaḥ ||79||(83)
GK19amaru_u:561: jātā notkalikā stanau na lulitau gātraṃ na romāñcitaṃ vaktraṃ svedakaṇānvita na sahasā yāvacchaṭhenāmunā
GK19amaru_u:562: dṛṣṭenāva mano hṛtaṃ dhṛtimuṣā prāṇeśvareṇādya me tatkenātra nirūpyamāṇanipuṇo mānaḥ samādhīyatām
GK19amaru_u:563: dṛṣṭaḥ kātaranetrayā cirtaraṃ baddhāñjaliṃ yācit paścādaṃśukapallavena vidhṛto nirvyājamāliṅgitaḥ
GK19amaru_u:564: ityākṣipya yadā samastamaghṛṇo gantuṃ pravṛttaḥ śaṭhaḥ pūrvaṃ prāṇaparigraho dayitayā muktastato vallabhaḥ ||81||(85)
GK19amaru_u:566: kṛto dūrādeva smitamadhuramabhyudgamavidhiḥ śirasyājñā nyastā prativacanavatyānatimati |
GK19amaru_u:567: na dṛṣṭeḥ śaithilyaṃ milana iti ceto dahati me nigūḍhāntaḥkopātkaṭhiṇahṛdaye saṃvṛtiriyam
GK19amaru_u:568: ekasmiñśayane vipakṣaramaṇīnāmagrahe mugdhayā sadyaḥ kopaparāṅmukhaṃ śayitayā cāṭūni kurvannapi
GK19amaru_u:569: āvegādavadhīritaḥ priyatamastūṣṇīṃ sthitastatkṣaṇāt mā bhūssupta ivaiṣa mandavalitagrīvaṃ punarvīkṣitaḥ ||83||(22)
GK19amaru_u:570: malayamarutāṃ vrātā yātā vikāsitamallikā parimalabharo bhagno grīṣmastvamutsahase yadi |
GK19amaru_u:571: ghana ghaṭayituṃ nisnehaṃ tvāṃ ya eva nivartane prabhavati gavāṃ kinnaśchinnaṃ sa eva dhanañjayaḥ
GK19amaru_u:572: svaṃ dṛṣṭvā karajakṣataṃ madhumadakṣīvā vicāryerṣyayā gacchantī kva nu gacchasīti vidhṛtā bālā paṭānte mayā |
GK19amaru_u:573: pratyāvṛttamukhī sabāṣpanayanā māṃ muñca muñceti sā kopātprasphuritādharā yadavadattatkena vismaryate ||85||(55)
GK19amaru_u:575: kṣiptaṃ bhṛśaṃ kupitayā taralotpalākṣyā saubhāgyacihnamiva mūrdhni padaṃ vireje ||86||
GK19amaru_u:577: kapole patrālī karatalanirodhena mṛditā nipīto niḥśvāsairayamamṛtahṛdyo'dhararasaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:578: muhuḥ kaṇṭhe lagnastaralayati bāṣpaḥ stanataṭaṃ priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe na tu vayam
GK19amaru_u:580: lākṣālakṣmalalāṭapaṭṭamabhitaḥ keyūramudrā gale vaktre kajjalakālimā nayanayorstāmbūlarāgo ghanaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:581: dṛṣṭā kopavidhāyi maṇḍanamidaṃ prātaściraṃ preyaso līlātāmarasodare mṛgadṛśaḥ śvāsāḥ samāptiṃ gatāḥ ||88||(60)
GK19amaru_u:586: cintāmohaviniścalena manasā maunena pādānataḥ pratyākhyānaparāṅmukhaḥ priyatamo gantuṃ pravṛtto'dhunā
GK19amaru_u:588: tanvaṅgyā gurusannidhau nayanajaṃ yad vāri saṃstambhitaṃ tenāntargalitena manmathaśikhī sikto'nuṣaṅgodbhavaḥ
GK19amaru_u:589: manye tasya nirasyamānakiraṇasyaiṣā mukhenodgatā śvāsāmodasamākulālinikaravyājena dhūmāvaliḥ
GK19amaru_u:590: bhrūbhedo racitaḥ ciraṃ nayanayorabhyastamāmīlanaṃ roddhuṃ śikṣitamādareṇa hasitaṃ maune'bhiyogaḥ kṛtaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:591: dhairyaṃ kartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā baddho mānaparigrahe parikaraḥ siddhistu daivasthitā ||92||(97)
GK19amaru_u:593: bhrūbhaṅgo guṇitaściraṃ nayanayorabhyastamāmīlanaṃ roddhuṃ śikṣitamādareṇa hasitaṃ maune'bhiyogaḥ kṛtaḥ |
GK19amaru_u:594: dhairyaṃ kartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā baddho mānaparigrahe parikaraḥ siddhistu daive sthitā ||
GK19amaru_u:596: deśairantaritā śataiśca saritāmurvībhṛtāṃ kānanair yatnenāpi na yāti locanapathaṃ kānteti jānannapi |
GK19amaru_u:597: udgrīvaścaraṇārdharuddhavasudhaḥ kṛtvāśrupūrṇāṃ dṛśaṃ tāmāśāṃ pathikastathāpi kimapi dhyāyaṃściraṃ vīkṣate ||93||(99)
GK19amaru_u:599: mlānaṃ pāṇḍu kṛśaṃ viyogavidhuraṃ lambālakaṃ sālasaṃ bhūyastatkṣaṇajātakānti rabhasaprāpte mayi proṣite |
GK19amaru_u:600: sāṭopaṃ ratikelikālasarasaṃ ramyaṃ kimapyādarād yatpītaṃ sutanormayā vadanakaṃ vaktuṃ na tatpāryate
GK19amaru_u:601: saivāhaṃ pramadā nṛṇāmadhigatāvetau ca tau nūpurāv eṣāsmākamavṛttireva sahajavrīḍādhanaḥ strījanaḥ
GK19amaru_u:602: itthaṃ lajjitayā smṛterupagame matvā tanuṃ sambhramāt pumbhāvaḥ prathamaṃ rativyatikare muktastato vallabhaḥ ||95||(89)
GK19amaru_u:603: karakisalayaṃ dhūtvā dhūtvā vimārgati vāsasī kṣipati sumanomālāśeṣaṃ pradīpaśikhāṃ prati |
GK19amaru_u:604: sthagayati muhuḥ patyurnetre vihasya samākulā surataviratā ramyā tanvī muhurmuhurīkṣate ||96||(90)
GK19amaru_u:605: santyevātra gṛhe gṛhe yuvatayastāḥ pṛccha gatvādhunā preyāṃsaḥ praṇamanti kiṃ tava punardāso yathā vartate |
GK19amaru_u:606: ātmadrohiṇi durjanaiḥ pralapitaṃ karṇe'niśaṃ mā kṛthāś chinnasneharasā bhavanti puruṣā duḥkhānuvartyāḥ punaḥ ||97||(91)
GK19amaru_u:607: niḥśvāsā vadanaṃ dahanti hṛdayaṃ nirmūlamunmathyate nidrā neti na dṛśyate priyamukhaṃ rātrindivaṃ rudyate |
GK19amaru_u:608: aṅgaṃ śoṣamupaiti pādapatitaḥ preyāṃstathopekṣitaḥ sakhyaḥ kaṃ guṇamākalayya dayite mānaṃ vayaṃ kāritāḥ ||98||(92)
GK19amaru_u:610: adyārabhya yadi priye punarahaṃ mānasya vā'nyasya vā gṛhṇīyāṃ śaṭhadurnayena manasā nāmāpi saṃkṣepataḥ |
GK19amaru_u:611: tattenaiva vinā śaśāṅkadhavalāḥ spaṣṭāṭṭahāsā niśā eko vā divasaḥ payodamalino yāyānmama prāvṛṣi
GK19amaru_u:612: idaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ priyatama tanu śvetamatha kiṃ gamiṣyāmo yāmo bhavatu gamanenātha bhavatu
GK19amaru_u:613: purā yenāvaṃ me ciramanusṛtā cittapadavī sa evānyo jātaḥ sakhi paricitāḥ kasya puruṣāḥ ||100||(94)
GK19amaru_u:615: iti hi capalo mānārambhastathāpi hi notsahe hṛdayadayitaḥ kāntaḥ kāmaṃ kimatra karomyaham
GK19amaru_u:616: ahaṃ tenāhūtā kimapi kathayāmīti vijane samīpe cāsīnā sarasahṛdayatvādavahitā |
GK19amaru_u:617: tataḥ karṇopānte kimapi vadatāghrāya vadanaṃ gṛhītā dharmille sakhi sa ca mayā gāḍhamadhare
GK19amaru_u:618: cakṣuḥprītiprasakte manasi paricaye cintyamānābhyupāye rāge yāte'tibhūmiṃ vikasati sutarāṃ gocare dūtikāyāḥ |
GK19amaru_u:619: āstāṃ dūreṇa tāvatsarabhasadayitāliṅganānandalābhas tadgehopāntarathyābhramaṇamapi parāṃ nirvṛtiṃ santanoti ||103||(100)
GK19amaru_u:620: kānte talpamupāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ bandhanād vāso viślathamekhalāguṇadhṛtaṃ kiṃcinnitambe sthitam |
GK19amaru_u:621: etāvatsakhi vedmi sāmpratamahaṃ tasyāṅgasaṅge punaḥ ko'yaṃ kāsmi rataṃ nu vā kathamiti svalpāpi me na smṛtiḥ ||104||(101)
GK19amaru_u:622: prāsāde sā diśi diśi ca sā pṛṣṭhataḥ sā puraḥ sā paryaṅke sā pathi pathi ca sā tadviyogāturasya
GK19amaru_u:623: haṃho cetaḥ prakṛtiraparā nāsti me kāpi sā sā sā sā sā sā jagati sakale ko'yamadvaitavādaḥ
GK19amaru_u:624: Verses found in Arjunavarmadeva's version not found here aṅgulyagranakhena bāṣpasalilaṃ vikṣipya vikṣipya kiṃ
GK19amaru_u:625: tūṣṇīṃ rodiṣi kopane bahutaraṃ phūtkṛtya rodiṣyasi |
GK19amaru_u:628: tadvaktrābhimukhaṃ mukhaṃ vinamitaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā pādayos tasyālāpakutūhalākulatare śrotre niruddhe mayā |
GK19amaru_u:629: pāṇibhyāṃ ca tiraskṛtaḥ sapulakaḥ svedodgamo gaṇḍayoḥ sakhyaḥ kiṃ karavāṇi yānti śatadhā yatkañcuke sandhayaḥ ||(11)
GK19amaru_u:630: nāpeto'nunayena yaḥ priyasuhṛdvākyairna yaḥ saṃhṛto yo dīrghaṃ divasaṃ viṣahya viṣamaṃ yatnātkathaṃciddhṛtaḥ
GK19amaru_u:631: anyonyasya hṛte mukhe nihitayostiryakkathaṃciddṛśoḥ sa dvābhyāmativismṛtavyatikaro māno vihasyojjhitaḥ
GK19amaru_u:632: rātrau vāribharālasāmbudaravodvignena jātāśruṇā pānthenātmaviyogaduḥkhapiśunaṃ gītaṃ tathotkaṇṭhayā
GK19amaru_u:633: āstāṃ jīvitahāriṇaḥ pravasanālāpasya saṃkīrtanaṃ mānasyāpi jalāñjaliḥ sarabhasaṃ lokena datto yathā ||(54)
GK19amaru_u:634: capalahṛdayae kiṃ svātantryāttathā gṛhamāgataś caraṇapatitaḥ premārdrārdraḥ priyaḥ samupekṣitaḥ
GK19amaru_u:635: tadidamadhunā yāvajjīvaṃ nirastasukhodayā ruditaśaraṇā durjātānāṃ sahasva ruṣāṃ phalam ||(56)
GK19amaru_u:636: āstāṃ viśvasanaṃ sakhīṣu viditābhiprāyasāre jane tatrāpyarpayituṃ dṛśaṃ suracitāṃ śaknomi na vrīḍayā |
GK19amaru_u:638: mātaḥ kaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi hṛdaye jīrṇo'nurāgānalaḥ ||(63)
GK19amaru_u:640: svabhāvaśobhānatimātrabhūṣaṇā tanustaveyaṃ bata kiṃ nu sundari ||(65)
GK19amaru_u:642: na kiṃcidityeva jagāda yadvadhūḥ kiyanna tenaiva tayāsya varṇitam ||(66)
GK19amaru_u:643: anālocya premṇaḥ pariṇatimanādṛtya suhṛdas tvayākāṇḍe mānaḥ kimiti sarale preyasi kṛtaḥ |
